short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify Http Request Or Response Header.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modify HTTP request headers, response headers

** What can ModifyHeader do?**
- Add, modify, and remove request and response headers
- Use ModifyHeader to set X-Forwarded-For, Authorization, Access-Control-Allow-Origin, Content-Security-Policy, and your custom headers!

** Why ModifyHeader **
- ModfiyHeader is fast, efficient, and light-weight. You can quickly enable/disable header modification with just 1-2 clicks.
- ModifyHeader provides you with many convenient features that will help you increase your development velocity with the least amount of frictions. 
- ModifyHeader is free to use.
